Package com.distrimind.bouncycastle.crypto.fpe

Class FPEFF1Engine

java.lang.Object
com.distrimind.bouncycastle.crypto.fpe.FPEEngine
com.distrimind.bouncycastle.crypto.fpe.FPEFF1Engine
public class FPEFF1Engine extends FPEEngine
NIST SP 800-38G, FF1 format preserving encryption.
